video.title: Henning Mankell's Wallander
video.synopsis: Brooding detective Kurt Wallander brings an intense obsession and fierce intellect to the murder cases he solves in this dark crime series.

episodes.synopsis: Kurt Wallander's newfound peace and quiet is shattered when the town's power station blows up and more acts of sabotage follow.
episodes.title: The Revenge

episodes.synopsis: When a 6-year-old boy disappears from preschool, Wallander and the Ystad police join a desperate search to find him.
episodes.title: The Guilt

episodes.synopsis: A motorbike racer is found dead and a girl is attacked by a dog. Clues to both crimes lead Wallander and the Ystad police to the local motorbike club.
episodes.title: The Courier

episodes.synopsis: When Ystad is hit by a wave of burglaries, a group of neighbors takes matters into its own hands by guarding the streets at night.
episodes.title: The Thief

episodes.synopsis: A Russian cellist is the target of a bomb attack following a performance in Ystad. It turns out that she is a witness in a murder case.
episodes.title: The Cellist

episodes.synopsis: A priest is shot outside a hostel in Ystad in what looks like an attempted murder.
episodes.title: The Priest

episodes.synopsis: When a security van is robbed, Wallander suspects a leak inside the security company and seeks some expert advice from an old friend.
episodes.title: The Leak

episodes.synopsis: A sniper is terrorizing Ystad, and the victims are all connected to the robbery of a jewelry store.
episodes.title: The Sniper

episodes.synopsis: A young women's choir gives an acclaimed guest performance in a country church outside Ystad. Afterward, an 18-year-old choir member disappears.
episodes.title: The Angel of Death

episodes.synopsis: A house burns to the ground following a gas explosion, killing a man and woman. The police suspect arson.
episodes.title: The Ghost

episodes.synopsis: The Bräda cider factory hosts a business dinner, during which the company's CEO is killed. Could a competitor be behind the killing?
episodes.title: The Heritage

episodes.synopsis: A woman is found dead in her flat, and it soon becomes clear to Wallander that there was a fight that got out of hand.
episodes.title: The Collector

episodes.synopsis: A little girl is hiding somewhere in Ystad. She has seen something terrible and must be silenced at all costs.
episodes.title: The Witness

episodes.synopsis: A fisherman pulls the dead body of a diver out of the sea. This event sets Wallander on an investigation with ties to the Cold War State Affairs.
episodes.title: The Troubled Man

episodes.synopsis: Ella, an 8-year-old girl, disappears on her way to school. All that is found is a piece of candy and the girl's bicycle hidden in a swamp.
episodes.title: Missing

episodes.synopsis: A young student reports her mother missing. The next day, the mother's burned body is found buried in the sand close to the family's house.
episodes.title: The Betrayal

episodes.synopsis: Wallander asks his doctor about his memory loss. Meanwhile, his granddaughter spots a human head buried in the ground while on a field trip.
episodes.title: The Loss

episodes.synopsis: Wallander has been diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease. Tommy is suspected of arson again after being released from prison.
episodes.title: The Arsonist

episodes.synopsis: It's Christmas in the town of Ystad, and Wallander struggles with his bad memory. Meanwhile, a well-known restaurant owner is brutally kidnapped.
episodes.title: The Sad Bird
